Question: This person was a huge hit in the UK and Ireland and continued touring there throughout 1991.
Hints: It was in the UK, however, where this person first amassed a significant fan base, packing large venues with his 1991 tour.
Although Letterman later expressed regret at the way this person had been handled, this person did not appear on the show again.
Likewise, in "Comedy Central Presents: 100 Greatest Stand-ups of All Time" (2004), this person was ranked at #19.
